name: The Saint's Tomb
storyline: In the game you make your own character using a website such as DnD Beyond, then go forth to investigate a mysterious figure who has a suspicious interest in the tomb of a dead priest. You'll battle the undead, figure out problems and roll the dice to save your city!
summary: A hybrid of a choose-your-own adventure type computer game and a pen-and-paper roleplaying game. Compatible with the 5th edition of the world's most popular tabletop RPG, this solo adventure introduces players to the dice-rolling action and problem-solving intrigue of a pen-and-paper role-playing game using text-based descriptions.
